all_procs.procedure_1.csv:
item,phasetype,max_time,text,shuffle_1,weight, 0,uor_intro,user,Welcome,,, 0,lop_studentnumber,user,"Welcome to the study",,, 0,lop_bookend,user,"Rhymes

The following screen displays a word, as part of a question, for 2 seconds. You will then have a short pause before being presented with a new word. You then have 4 seconds to answer whether the second word rhymed with the first.

When you are ready, press start.",,, 52 to 81,lop_encode,user,"Does the following word rhyme with

",encode_only,, 0,video-play,user,"Thank you for completing the previous task.

You will now watch a video, lasting a couple of minutes. The video has sound. Please make sure you volume is low enough not to disturb those around you. You may mute your speakers if you wish.

When you are ready to begin watching, press play.",,, 0,video,user,,,, 0,lop_bookend,user,"Recall

The following task requires you to recall as many of the words from the previous 'Rhyming' task as you can. Individual words will be displayed in turn along with 'Yes/No' response buttons. Simply indicate whether you recognise the word or not as being part of the previous task. Each word will remain displayed until you provide an answer.

When you are ready, press start.",,, 52 to 101,lop_recall,user,Do you recognise the following word?,all_words,, 0,upload_data,7,,,, 0,lop_end,user,"Thank you for completing the study

We're collecting data across all three seminars and you'll get to see the results next week.

When you are ready to leave, press finish.",,,
all_procs.procedure_2.csv:
item,phasetype,max_time,text,shuffle_1,weight, 0,uor_intro,user,Welcome,,, 0,lop_studentnumber,user,"Welcome to the study",,, 0,lop_bookend,user,"Types

The following screen displays a question for 2 seconds. There will then be a short pause before you are presented with a word. You then have 4 seconds to answer whether that word correctly answers the original question.

When you are ready, press start.",,, 2 to 31,lop_encode,user,Is the word ,encode_only,, 0,video-play,user,"Thank you for completing the previous task.

You will now watch a video, lasting a couple of minutes. The video has sound. Please make sure you volume is low enough not to disturb those around you. You may mute your speakers if you wish.

When you are ready to begin watching, press play.",,, 0,video,user,,,, 0,lop_bookend,user,"Recall

Simply indicate whether you recognise the word or not as being part of the previous task. Each word will remain displayed until you provide an answer.

When you are ready, press start.",,, 2 to 51,lop_recall,user,Do you recognise the following word?,all_words,, 0,upload_data,7,,,, 0,lop_end,user,"Thank you for completing the study

We're collecting data across all three seminars and you'll get to see the results next week.

When you are ready to leave, press finish.",,,
all_procs.procedure_3.csv:
item,phasetype,max_time,text,shuffle_1,weight, 0,uor_intro,user,Welcome,,, 0,lop_studentnumber,user,"Welcome to the study",,, 0,lop_bookend,user,"Type Case

The following screen displays a question for 2 seconds. There will then be a short pause before you are presented with a word. You then have 4 seconds to answer whether that word correctly answers the original question.

When you are ready, press start.",,, 102 to 131,lop_encode,user,Is the word written in ,encode_only,, 0,video-play,user,"Thank you for completing the previous task.

You will now watch a video, lasting a couple of minutes. The video has sound. Please make sure you volume is low enough not to disturb those around you. You may mute your speakers if you wish.

When you are ready to begin watching, press play.",,, 0,video,user,,,, 0,lop_bookend,user,"Recall

The following task requires you to recall as many of the words from the previous 'Type Case' task as you can. Individual words will be displayed in turn along with 'Yes/No' response buttons. Simply indicate whether you recognise the word or not as being part of the previous task. Each word will remain displayed until you provide an answer.

When you are ready, press start.",,, 102 to 151,lop_recall,user,Do you recognise the following word?,all_words,, 0,upload_data,7,,,, 0,lop_end,user,"Thank you for completing the study

We're collecting data across all three seminars and you'll get to see the results next week.
